Line 30: Line 30:
==Linux versions==
==Linux versions==
  +
[[Image:Nero Linux.png|Nero Linux|thumb|200px]]
A [[Linux]] port of the [[Nero burning rom|Nero Burning ROM]] application, Nero Linux, was announced as a free "upgrade" from the [[Microsoft Windows]] version in March 2005.<ref>{{cite web | url = http://www.flexbeta.net/main/articles.php?action=show&showarticle=86 | title = NeroLinux vs K3b | publisher = Flexbeta | date = 2005-03-15 | accessdate = 2007-02-01 }}</ref> The application replicates most features of the Windows version, and uses the [[GTK+]] graphical toolkit. As of [[2008-02-26]] a trial version is freely downloadable.
A [[Linux]] port of the [[Nero burning rom|Nero Burning ROM]] application, Nero Linux, was announced as a free "upgrade" from the [[Microsoft Windows]] version in March 2005.<ref>{{cite web | url = http://www.flexbeta.net/main/articles.php?action=show&showarticle=86 | title = NeroLinux vs K3b | publisher = Flexbeta | date = 2005-03-15 | accessdate = 2007-02-01 }}</ref> The application replicates most features of the Windows version, and uses the [[GTK+]] graphical toolkit. As of [[2008-02-26]] a trial version is freely downloadable.
